Posted By: Peter Thomas
I am trying to find upgrades for any of the following 10 PSA 5 Ramly's:
Bender, Crandall, Elberfield, Evers, Manning, Morgan, Paskert, Plank, Shipke and Unclane.
I am open to trades, for example, your 6 for my 5 and another Ramly card or money. I know it is a longshot, but I an still trying to improve my set. I did get 3 upgrades last year, 2 common 5's to 6's and at the National, Brown from a 6 to a 7.

Thanks
